publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4565 Christine Grahame: Members’ Dining Room - Scottish Fortnight—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of Scottish Fortnight in the members’ dining room from 4 to 15 September 2006, which will showcase such delectations as grilled Finnan smoked haddie, seared Perthshire lamb chops, supreme of Letham chicken, pressed Fife pigeon terrine, Ayrshire bacon broth, bread pudding with Dundee marmalade and Eccelfechan butter tart, showcasing Scottish produce and recipes, and considers that the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body should, so far as possible, in allocating catering contracts, endeavour to secure agreements which maximise the use of Scottish produce with a view to this two week taster becoming a permanent feature in the members’ dining room. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Mr John Swinney*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*

S2M-4565 Christine Grahame: Members’ Dining Room - Scottish Fortnight—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of Scottish Fortnight in the members’ dining room from 4 to 15 September 2006, which will showcase such delectations as grilled Finnan smoked haddie, seared Perthshire lamb chops, supreme of Letham chicken, pressed Fife pigeon terrine, Ayrshire bacon broth, bread pudding with Dundee marmalade and Eccelfechan butter tart, showcasing Scottish produce and recipes, and considers that the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body should, so far as possible, in allocating catering contracts, endeavour to secure agreements which maximise the use of Scottish produce with a view to this two week taster becoming a permanent feature in the members’ dining room. Supported by: Brian Adam, Mr John Swinney, Rob Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Michael Matheson*
S2M-4565 Members’ Dining Room - Scottish Fortnight (lodged on 15 June 2006) Alex Neil*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4565 Members’ Dining Room - Scottish Fortnight (lodged on 15 June 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*, John Swinburne*
S2M-4565 Members’ Dining Room - Scottish Fortnight (lodged on 15 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4565 Members’ Dining Room - Scottish Fortnight (lodged on 15 June 2006) Linda Fabiani*
